summary: Regular Lindenbaum does NOT preserve temporal saturation - fundamental mathematical fact, not implementation bug. TemporalLindenbaum.lean has 3 sorries in Henkin base case blocking completion. Truth lemma requires ALL families to be temporally coherent (not just eval_family). Recommended path: fix TemporalLindenbaum base case sorries by pre-processing base to ensure temporal closure.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Lindenbaum temporal saturation gap with counterexample, sorry inventory, and remediation paths
